trans-unit.source: When it is first executed, CMake generates a CMakeCache.txt file in the build directory containing key-value pairs for such artifacts. The cache file can be viewed or edited by the user by running the cmake-gui(1) or ccmake(1) tool. The tools provide an interactive interface for re-configuring the provided software and re-generating the buildsystem, as is needed after editing cached values. Each cache entry may have an associated short help text which is displayed in the user interface tools.
trans-unit.target: 首次执行时，CMake在构建目录中生成 CMakeCache.txt 文件，其中包含此类工件的键值对。用户可以通过运行 cmake-gui(1) 或 ccmake(1) 工具来查看或编辑缓存文件。这些工具提供了一个交互式界面，用于重新配置所提供的软件并重新生成构建系统，这是在编辑缓存的值之后所需的。每个缓存条目可能具有关联的简短帮助文本，该文本显示在用户界面工具中。

trans-unit.source: When language <LANG> is enabled by project() or enable_language() this variable is defined to 1.
trans-unit.target: 通过 project() 或 enable_language() 启用语言 <LANG> 时,此变量定义为 1 。

trans-unit.source: When linking a shared library or executable that exports symbols using GNU tools on Windows (MinGW/MSYS) with Visual Studio installed convert the import library (.dll.a) from GNU to MS format (.lib). Both import libraries will be installed by install(TARGETS) and exported by install(EXPORT) and export() to be linked by applications with either GNU- or MS-compatible tools.
trans-unit.target: 在安装了Visual Studio的Windows（MinGW / MSYS）上链接使用导出符号的共享库或可执行文件时，请将导入库（ .dll.a ）从GNU转换为MS格式（ .lib ）。两个导入库都将通过 install(TARGETS) 安装，并通过 install(EXPORT) 和 export() 导出，以由应用程序使用兼容GNU或MS的工具链接。

trans-unit.source: When linking to a STATIC library target with cyclic dependencies the linker may need to scan more than once through the archives in the strongly connected component of the dependency graph. CMake by default constructs the link line so that the linker will scan through the component at least twice. This property specifies the minimum number of scans if it is larger than the default. CMake uses the largest value specified by any target in a component.
trans-unit.target: 当链接到具有循环依赖项的 STATIC 库目标时，链接器可能需要多次扫描依赖关系图的强连接组件中的归档。默认情况下，CMake构造链接线，以便链接器至少扫描两次该组件。如果该属性大于默认值，则该属性指定最小扫描次数。CMake使用组件中任何目标指定的最大值。

trans-unit.source: When loading a find module or package configuration file find_package defines variables to provide information about the call arguments (and restores their original state before returning):
trans-unit.target: 加载查找模块或程序包配置文件时， find_package 定义变量以提供有关调用参数的信息（并在返回之前恢复其原始状态）：

trans-unit.source: When more than one value is given to the NAMES option this command by default will consider one name at a time and search every directory for it. The NAMES_PER_DIR option tells this command to consider one directory at a time and search for all names in it.
trans-unit.target: 当为 NAMES 选项赋予多个值时，默认情况下，此命令将一次考虑一个名称，并在每个目录中搜索该名称。该 NAMES_PER_DIR 选项告诉该命令在一个时间来考虑一个目录和搜索中的所有名字。

trans-unit.source: When multiple CUDA Toolkits are installed in the default location of a system (e.g., both /usr/local/cuda-9.0 and /usr/local/cuda-10.0 exist but the /usr/local/cuda symbolic link does not exist), this package is marked as not found.
trans-unit.target: 当多个CUDA工具包安装在一个系统中的默认位置（例如，二者 /usr/local/cuda-9.0 和 /usr/local/cuda-10.0 存在，但 /usr/local/cuda 符号链接并没有存在），此程序包被标记为未找到。

trans-unit.source: When multiple source files are included into one source file, as is done for unity builds, it can potentially lead to ODR errors. CMake provides a number of measures to help address such problems:
trans-unit.target: 当多个源文件被包含在一个源文件中时,就像unity构建时那样,它可能会导致ODR错误。CMake 提供了一些措施来帮助解决这些问题。

trans-unit.source: When no CONFIGURE_COMMAND option is specified, the configure step assumes the external project has a CMakeLists.txt file at the top of its source tree (i.e. in SOURCE_DIR). The SOURCE_SUBDIR option can be used to point to an alternative directory within the source tree to use as the top of the CMake source tree instead. This must be a relative path and it will be interpreted as being relative to SOURCE_DIR.

When no CONFIGURE_COMMAND option is specified, the configure step assumes the external project has a CMakeLists.txt file at the top of its source tree (i.e. in SOURCE_DIR). The SOURCE_SUBDIR option can be used to point to an alternative directory within the source tree to use as the top of the CMake source tree instead. This must be a relative path and it will be interpreted as being relative to SOURCE_DIR. When BUILD_IN_SOURCE 1 is specified, the BUILD_COMMAND is used to point to an alternative directory within the source tree.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 CONFIGURE_COMMAND 选项，则配置步骤假定外部项目在其源树的顶部（即 SOURCE_DIR 中）具有 CMakeLists.txt 文件。该 SOURCE_SUBDIR 选项可以用来指向一个替代目录中的源树中作为CMake的源树而不是顶部使用。这必须是相对路径，并且将被解释为相对于 SOURCE_DIR 。当 BUILD_IN_SOURCE 1 指定，则 BUILD_COMMAND 用于指向在源树中的替代目录。

trans-unit.source: When not cross-compiling, this variable has the same value as the CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR variable. In many cases, this will correspond to the target architecture for the build, but this is not guaranteed. (E.g. on Windows, the host may be AMD64 even when using a MSVC cl compiler with a 32-bit target.)

When preparing a package CPack installs the item under the so-called top level directory. The purpose of is to include (set to 1 or ON or TRUE) the top level directory in the package or not (set to 0 or OFF or FALSE).
trans-unit.target: 在准备软件包时，CPack将该项目安装在所谓的顶级目录下。的目的是在包中包含或不包含（设置为 1 或 ON 或 TRUE ）顶级目录（设置为 0 或 OFF 或 FALSE ）。

trans-unit.source: When provided, only the listed files will be scanned for test cases. If this option is not given, the SOURCES property of the specified target will be used to obtain the list of sources.
trans-unit.target: 提供后，将仅扫描列出的文件以查找测试用例。如果未提供此选项，则将使用指定 target 的 SOURCES 属性获取源列表。

trans-unit.source: When providing imported targets, these should be namespaced (hence the Foo:: prefix); CMake will recognize that values passed to target_link_libraries() that contain :: in their name are supposed to be imported targets (rather than just library names), and will produce appropriate diagnostic messages if that target does not exist (see policy CMP0028).
trans-unit.target: 提供导入的目标时，应为其命名空间（因此，添加了 Foo:: 前缀）；CMake将认识到传递给 target_link_libraries() 名称中包含 :: 的值应该被导入为目标（而不只是库名），并且如果该目标不存在，则将生成适当的诊断消息（请参阅策略 CMP0028 ）。

trans-unit.source: When recording a check result, the command repeats the message from the most recently started check for which no result has yet been reported, then some separator characters and then the message text provided after the CHECK_PASS or CHECK_FAIL keyword. Check messages are always reported at STATUS log level.
trans-unit.target: 记录检查结果时，该命令将从最近一次尚未报告结果的检查开始重复该消息，然后重复一些分隔符，然后在 CHECK_PASS 或 CHECK_FAIL 关键字之后提供消息文本。检查消息始终以 STATUS 日志级别报告。

trans-unit.source: When run in -P script mode, CMake sets the variables CMAKE_BINARY_DIR, CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR, CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR and CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 在-P脚本模式下运行时，CMake将变量 CMAKE_BINARY_DIR ， CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR ， CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR 和 CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR 设置到当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: When run in -P script mode, CMake sets the variables CMAKE_BINARY_DIR, CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR, CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR and CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 在-P脚本模式下运行时，CMake将变量 CMAKE_BINARY_DIR ， CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR ， CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR 和 CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR 设置到当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: When run in -P script mode, CMake sets the variables CMAKE_BINARY_DIR, CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR, CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR and CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 在-P脚本模式下运行时，CMake将变量 CMAKE_BINARY_DIR ， CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR ， CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR 和 CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR 设置到当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: When run in cmake(1)-P script mode, CMake sets this variable to the full path of the script file. When run to configure a CMakeLists.txt file, this variable is not set.
trans-unit.target: 在 cmake(1) -P 脚本模式下运行时，CMake将此变量设置为脚本文件的完整路径。在运行以配置 CMakeLists.txt 文件时，未设置此变量。

trans-unit.source: When run in -P script mode, CMake sets this variable to the first command line argument. It then also sets CMAKE_ARGV1, CMAKE_ARGV2, … and so on, up to the number of command line arguments given. See also CMAKE_ARGC.
trans-unit.target: 在-P脚本模式下运行时，CMake将此变量设置为第一个命令行参数。然后，它还会设置 CMAKE_ARGV1 ， CMAKE_ARGV2 …等等，直到指定的命令行参数数量为止。另请参阅 CMAKE_ARGC 。

trans-unit.source: When run in -P script mode, CMake sets this variable to the first command line argument. It then also sets CMAKE_ARGV1, CMAKE_ARGV2, ... and so on, up to the number of command line arguments given. See also CMAKE_ARGC.
When run in -P script mode, CMake sets this variable to the number of command line arguments. See also CMAKE_ARGV0, 1, 2 …
trans-unit.target: 在-P脚本模式下运行时，CMake将此变量设置为命令行参数的数量。又见 CMAKE_ARGV0 ， 1 ， 2 ...

trans-unit.source: When run in -P script mode, CMake sets this variable to the number of command line arguments. See also CMAKE_ARGV0, 1, 2 ...
When run in -P script mode, CMake sets the variables CMAKE_BINARY_DIR, CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR, CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR and CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 在 -P 脚本模式下运行时，CMake将变量 CMAKE_BINARY_DIR ， CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR ， CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR 和 CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR 设置到当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: When running cmake(1), this option can be enabled with the -Wdeprecated option, or disabled with the -Wno-deprecated option.
trans-unit.target: 运行 cmake(1) 时，可以使用 -Wdeprecated 选项启用此选项，或者使用 -Wno-deprecated preprecated选项禁用此选项。

trans-unit.source: When running AUTOMOC, CMake searches for the strings listed in AUTOMOC_MACRO_NAMES in C++ source and header files. If any of the strings is found
trans-unit.target: 运行 AUTOMOC 时，CMake 在C ++源文件和头文件中搜索 AUTOMOC_MACRO_NAMES 中列出的字符串。如果找到任何字符串

trans-unit.source: When running CMake with the --graphviz=foo.dot option, it produces:
trans-unit.target: 使用 --graphviz=foo.dot 选项运行CMake时，它将产生：

trans-unit.source: When saving a failing test’s output, this is the maximum size, in bytes, that will be collected by the ctest_test() command. Defaults to 307200 (300 KiB).
trans-unit.target: 保存失败测试的输出时，这是 ctest_test() 命令将收集的最大大小（以字节为单位）。默认为307200（300 KiB）。

trans-unit.source: When saving a failing test's output, this is the maximum size, in bytes, that will be collected by the ctest_test() command. Defaults to 307200 (300 KiB).
When saving a passing test’s output, this is the maximum size, in bytes, that will be collected by the ctest_test() command. Defaults to 1024 (1 KiB).
trans-unit.target: 保存通过测试的输出时，这是 ctest_test() 命令将收集的最大大小（以字节为单位）。默认为1024（1 KiB）。

trans-unit.source: When saving a passing test's output, this is the maximum size, in bytes, that will be collected by the ctest_test() command. Defaults to 1024 (1 KiB).

When searching for frameworks, if the file is specified as A/b.h, then the framework search will look for A.framework/Headers/b.h. If that is found the path will be set to the path to the framework. CMake will convert this to the correct -F option to include the file.
trans-unit.target: 搜索框架时，如果文件指定为 A/b.h ，则框架搜索将查找 A.framework/Headers/b.h 。如果找到，则将路径设置为框架的路径。CMake会将其转换为正确的 -F 选项以包含文件。

trans-unit.source: When set this is used instead of AUTOGEN_SOURCE_GROUP for files generated by AUTOMOC.
trans-unit.target: 设置后，对于 AUTOGEN_SOURCE_GROUP 生成的文件，将使用它代替 AUTOMOC 。

trans-unit.source: When set this is used instead of AUTOGEN_SOURCE_GROUP for files generated by AUTORCC.
trans-unit.target: 设置后，对于 AUTOGEN_SOURCE_GROUP 生成的文件，将使用它代替 AUTORCC 。

trans-unit.source: When set to TRUE in a directory, the build system produced by the Makefile Generators is set up to only consider dependencies on source files that appear either in the source or in the binary directories. Changes to source files outside of these directories will not cause rebuilds.
trans-unit.target: 在目录中设置为 TRUE 时，Makefile Generators生成的构建系统将设置为仅考虑对源文件或二进制目录中出现的源文件的依赖性。在这些目录之外对源文件进行更改将不会导致重建。

trans-unit.source: When set, this variable specifies the logging level used by the message() command. Valid values are the same as those for the --log-level command line option of the cmake(1) program. If this variable is set and the --log-level command line option is given, the command line option takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 设置后，此变量指定 message() 命令使用的日志记录级别。有效值与 cmake(1) 程序的 --log-level 命令行选项的值相同。如果设置了此变量并给出了 --log-level 命令行选项，则命令行选项优先。

trans-unit.source: When source property OUTPUT_DIR is defined, multiple directories can be specified as part of SWIG_SUPPORT_FILES_DIRECTORY.
trans-unit.target: 定义源属性 OUTPUT_DIR 时，可以将多个目录指定为 SWIG_SUPPORT_FILES_DIRECTORY 的一部分。

trans-unit.source: When specified, arguments of the LINKER: prefix will be concatenated using this value as separator.
trans-unit.target: 指定后，将使用该值作为分隔符来连接 LINKER: 前缀的参数。

trans-unit.source: When specifying index values, if <element index> is 0 or greater, it is indexed from the beginning of the list, with 0 representing the first list element. If <element index> is -1 or lesser, it is indexed from the end of the list, with -1 representing the last list element. Be careful when counting with negative indices: they do not start from 0. -0 is equivalent to 0, the first list element.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引值时，如果 <element index> 为0或更大，则从列表的开头开始索引，0表示第一个列表元素。如果 <element index> 为-1或更小，则从列表末尾开始索引，而-1表示最后一个列表元素。使用负索引进行计数时要小心：它们不是从0开始。-0等效于第一个列表元素0。

trans-unit.source: When target dependencies are specified using target_link_libraries(), CMake will read this property from all target dependencies to determine the build properties of the consumer.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 target_link_libraries() 指定目标依赖关系时，CMake将从所有目标依赖关系中读取此属性，以确定使用者的构建属性。

trans-unit.source: When target dependencies are specified using target_link_libraries(), CMake will read this property from all target dependencies to determine the sources of the consumer.
trans-unit.target: 使用 target_link_libraries() 指定目标依赖项时，CMake将从所有目标依赖项中读取此属性以确定使用者的来源。

trans-unit.source: When target dependencies are specified using target_link_libraries(), CMake will read this property from all target dependencies to mark the same include directories as containing system headers.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 target_link_libraries() 指定目标依赖关系时，CMake将从所有目标依赖关系读取此属性，以将相同的包含目录标记为包含系统标头。

trans-unit.source: When targeting Windows 10 and above Visual Studio 2015 and above support specification of a target Windows version to select a corresponding SDK. The CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION variable may be set to specify a version. Otherwise CMake computes a default version based on the Windows SDK versions available. The chosen Windows target version number is provided in CMAKE_VS_WINDOWS_TARGET_PLATFORM_VERSION. If no Windows 10 SDK is available this value will be empty.
trans-unit.target: 针对Windows 10及更高版本时，Visual Studio 2015及更高版本支持目标Windows版本的规范，以选择相应的SDK。可以将 CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION 变量设置为指定版本。否则，CMake将根据可用的Windows SDK版本计算默认版本。所选的Windows目标版本号在 CMAKE_VS_WINDOWS_TARGET_PLATFORM_VERSION 中提供。如果没有Windows 10 SDK可用，则此值为空。

trans-unit.source: When test MyTest runs the DATA{MyInput.png} argument will be replaced by the full path to a real instance of the data file MyInput.png on disk. If the source tree contains a content link such as MyInput.png.md5 then the MyData target creates a real MyInput.png in the build tree.
trans-unit.target: 当测试 MyTest 运行时， DATA{MyInput.png} 参数将替换为磁盘上数据文件 MyInput.png 真实实例的完整路径。如果源树包含诸如 MyInput.png.md5 之 MyData 的内容链接，则MyData目标将在构建树中创建一个真实的 MyInput.png 。

trans-unit.source: When the find_package() command returns to the caller, this variable will be set to true if the module was deemed to have been found successfully.

When the find_package() command finds a candidate package configuration file it looks next to it for a version file. The version file is loaded to test whether the package version is an acceptable match for the version requested. If the version file claims compatibility the configuration file is accepted. Otherwise it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 当 find_package() 命令找到候选软件包配置文件时，它将在其旁边查找版本文件。加载版本文件以测试软件包版本是否与请求的版本相匹配。如果版本文件声明兼容性，则接受配置文件。否则将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: When the find_package() command loads a version file it first sets the following variables:
trans-unit.target: 当 find_package() 命令加载版本文件时，它首先设置以下变量：

trans-unit.source: When the option() command sees a normal variable of the given name:
trans-unit.target: 当 option() 命令看到给定名称的普通变量时：

trans-unit.source: When the ExternalProject_Add()UPDATE_DISCONNECTED or TEST_EXCLUDE_FROM_MAIN option is used, or the ExternalProject_Add_Step()EXCLUDE_FROM_MAIN option is used for a custom step, some step targets may be created automatically. These are needed to hold the steps commonly depended upon by the primary target and the disconnected step targets.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 ExternalProject_Add() UPDATE_DISCONNECTED 或 TEST_EXCLUDE_FROM_MAIN 选项，或者将 ExternalProject_Add_Step() EXCLUDE_FROM_MAIN 选项用于自定义步骤，则可能会自动创建某些步骤目标。需要这些来保持通常由主要目标和断开连接的目标所依赖的步骤。

trans-unit.source: When the PROCESSORS test property is set, CTest will display a weighted test timing result in label and subproject summaries. The time is reported with sec*proc instead of just sec.
trans-unit.target: 当 PROCESSORS 测试属性设置，CTEST将显示在标签和子项目摘要加权测试定时结果。时间是用 sec*proc 而不是 sec 报告的。

trans-unit.source: When the INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES of an imported target is consumed, the entries in the property are treated as SYSTEM include directories, as if they were listed in the INTERFACE_SYSTEM_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES of the dependency. This can result in omission of compiler warnings for headers found in those directories. This behavior for Imported Targets may be controlled by setting the NO_SYSTEM_FROM_IMPORTED target property on the consumers of imported targets.
trans-unit.target: 当消耗了导入目标的 INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 时，该属性中的条目将被视为 SYSTEM 包含目录，就像它们在依赖项的 INTERFACE_SYSTEM_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 中列出一样。这可能会导致在这些目录中找到的标头省略编译器警告。可以通过在导入目标的使用者上设置 NO_SYSTEM_FROM_IMPORTED 目标属性来控制导入目标的此行为。

trans-unit.source: When the CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME variable takes its default value then CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION is by default set to the same value as the CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_VERSION variable so that the build targets the host system version.
trans-unit.target: 当 CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME 变量采用其默认值时，默认情况下，将 CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION 设置为与 CMAKE_HOST_SYSTEM_VERSION 变量相同的值，从而使构建以主机系统版本为目标。

trans-unit.source: When the CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME variable is set explicitly to enable cross compiling then the value of CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION must also be set explicitly to specify the target system version.
trans-unit.target: 当明确设置 CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME 变量以启用交叉编译时，则还必须明确设置 CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION 的值以指定目标系统版本。

trans-unit.source: When the --show-only=json-v1 command line option is given, the test information is output in JSON format. Version 1.0 of the JSON object model is defined as follows:
trans-unit.target: 给出 --show-only=json-v1 命令行选项时，测试信息以JSON格式输出。JSON对象模型的1.0版定义如下：

trans-unit.source: When the CUDA language has been enabled, this provides a semicolon-separated list of include directories provided by the CUDA Toolkit. The value may be useful for C++ source files to include CUDA headers.
trans-unit.target: 当 CUDA 语言已启用，这提供了一个分号分隔的列表中包括由CUDA工具包提供的目录。该值对于C ++源文件包含CUDA标头可能很有用。

trans-unit.source: When the NORMALIZE option is specified, <path-var> and <input> are normalized before the check.
When the NORMALIZE option is specified, the path is normalized after the path computation.
When the NORMALIZE option is specified, the path is normalized before the conversion.
When the QUIET argument is given, no status messages will be printed.
trans-unit.target: 当给出 QUIET 参数时，将不会打印任何状态消息。

trans-unit.source: When the REQUIRED argument is given, the command will fail with an error if module(s) could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 当 REQUIRED 给出参数，该命令将失败，一个错误，如果模块（S）无法找到。

trans-unit.source: When the [version] argument is given Config mode will only find a version of the package that claims compatibility with the requested version (format is major[.minor[.patch[.tweak]]]). If the EXACT option is given only a version of the package claiming an exact match of the requested version may be found. CMake does not establish any convention for the meaning of version numbers. Package version numbers are checked by “version” files provided by the packages themselves. For a candidate package configuration file <config-file>.cmake the corresponding version file is located next to it and named either <config-file>-version.cmake or <config-file>Version.cmake. If no such version file is available then the configuration file is assumed to not be compatible with any requested version. A basic version file containing generic version matching code can be created using the CMakePackageConfigHelpers module. When a version file is found it is loaded to check the requested version number. The version file is loaded in a nested scope in which the following variables have been defined:
trans-unit.target: 当给 [version] 参数 major[.minor[.patch[.tweak]]] Config模式将仅找到声称与所请求版本兼容的软件包版本（格式为major [.minor [.patch [.tweak]]]）。如果给出 EXACT 选项，则只能找到声称与请求版本完全匹配的软件包版本。 CMake没有为版本号的含义建立任何约定。软件包版本号由软件包本身提供的“版本”文件检查。对于候选软件包配置文件 <config-file>.cmake ，相应的版本文件位于其旁边，并命名为 <config-file>-version.cmake 或 <config-file>Version.cmake 。如果没有这样的版本文件，则认为配置文件与任何请求的版本都不兼容。可以使用 CMakePackageConfigHelpers 模块创建包含通用版本匹配代码的基本版本文件。找到版本文件后，将加载该文件以检查请求的版本号。版本文件将在嵌套范围中加载，在该范围中已定义以下变量：

trans-unit.source: When the [version] argument is given, Config mode will only find a version of the package that claims compatibility with the requested version (see format specification). If the EXACT option is given, only a version of the package claiming an exact match of the requested version may be found. CMake does not establish any convention for the meaning of version numbers. Package version numbers are checked by "version" files provided by the packages themselves. For a candidate package configuration file <config-file>.cmake the corresponding version file is located next to it and named either <config-file>-version.cmake or <config-file>Version.cmake. If no such version file is available then the configuration file is assumed to not be compatible with any requested version. A basic version file containing generic version matching code can be created using the CMakePackageConfigHelpers module. When a version file is found it is loaded to check the requested version number. The version file is loaded in a nested scope in which the following variables have been defined:

When the [version] argument is given, Config mode will only find a version of the package that claims compatibility with the requested version (see format specification). If the EXACT option is given, only a version of the package claiming an exact match of the requested version may be found. CMake does not establish any convention for the meaning of version numbers. Package version numbers are checked by “version” files provided by the packages themselves. For a candidate package configuration file <config-file>.cmake the corresponding version file is located next to it and named either <config-file>-version.cmake or <config-file>Version.cmake. If no such version file is available then the configuration file is assumed to not be compatible with any requested version. A basic version file containing generic version matching code can be created using the CMakePackageConfigHelpers module. When a version file is found it is loaded to check the requested version number. The version file is loaded in a nested scope in which the following variables have been defined:
trans-unit.target: 当提供 [version] 参数时，Config模式将仅找到声称与所请求版本兼容的软件包版本（请参见format规范）。如果给出了 EXACT 选项，则只能找到声称与请求版本完全匹配的软件包版本。 CMake没有为版本号的含义建立任何约定。软件包版本号由软件包本身提供的“版本”文件检查。对于候选软件包配置文件 <config-file>.cmake ，相应的版本文件位于其旁边，并命名为 <config-file>-version.cmake 或 <config-file>Version.cmake 。如果没有可用的版本文件，则认为配置文件与任何请求的版本都不兼容。可以使用 CMakePackageConfigHelpers 模块创建包含通用版本匹配代码的基本版本文件。找到版本文件后，将加载该文件以检查请求的版本号。版本文件将在嵌套范围中加载，在该范围中已定义以下变量：

trans-unit.source: When the _autogen target doesn’t require all the origin target’s dependencies, and AUTOGEN_ORIGIN_DEPENDS is disabled, it might be necessary to extend AUTOGEN_TARGET_DEPENDS to add missing dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 当 _autogen 目标并不需要所有源目标的依赖项，并且禁用了 AUTOGEN_ORIGIN_DEPENDS 时，可能有必要扩展 AUTOGEN_TARGET_DEPENDS 以添加缺少的依赖项。

trans-unit.source: When the _autogen target doesn't require all the origin target's dependencies, and AUTOGEN_ORIGIN_DEPENDS is disabled, it might be necessary to extend AUTOGEN_TARGET_DEPENDS to add missing dependencies.

When the cxx_static_assert feature is not provided by the compiler, a compatibility implementation is available via the <PREFIX>_STATIC_ASSERT(COND) and <PREFIX>_STATIC_ASSERT_MSG(COND, MSG) function-like macros. The macros expand to static_assert where that compiler feature is available, and to a compatibility implementation otherwise. In the first form, the condition is stringified in the message field of static_assert. In the second form, the message MSG is passed to the message field of static_assert, or ignored if using the backward compatibility implementation.
trans-unit.target: 当编译器未提供 cxx_static_assert 功能时，可通过 <PREFIX>_STATIC_ASSERT(COND) 和 <PREFIX>_STATIC_ASSERT_MSG(COND, MSG) 类似函数的宏来实现兼容性。宏将扩展到可使用该编译器功能的 static_assert ，否则将扩展到兼容性实现。在第一种形式中，条件在 static_assert 的消息字段中被字符串化。在第二种形式中，消息 MSG 传递到 static_assert 的消息字段，如果使用向后兼容实现，则将其忽略。

trans-unit.source: When the project() command is called from the top-level CMakeLists.txt, then the URL also is stored in the variable CMAKE_PROJECT_HOMEPAGE_URL.
trans-unit.target: 当从顶层 CMakeLists.txt 调用 project() 命令时，URL也存储在变量 CMAKE_PROJECT_HOMEPAGE_URL 中。

trans-unit.source: When the project() command is called from the top-level CMakeLists.txt, then the description is also stored in the variable CMAKE_PROJECT_DESCRIPTION.
trans-unit.target: 当从顶层 CMakeLists.txt 调用 project() 命令时，说明也存储在变量 CMAKE_PROJECT_DESCRIPTION 中。

trans-unit.source: When the project() command is called from the top-level CMakeLists.txt, then the version is also stored in the variable CMAKE_PROJECT_VERSION.
trans-unit.target: 当从顶层 CMakeLists.txt 调用 project() 命令时，版本也存储在变量 CMAKE_PROJECT_VERSION 中。

trans-unit.source: When the build system to be launched allows build-time selection of the configuration (e.g. Debug, Release), this specifies the default configuration to be built when no -C option is given to the ctest command. The value will be substituted into the value of MakeCommand to replace the literal string ${CTEST_CONFIGURATION_TYPE} if it appears.
trans-unit.target: 当要启动的构建系统允许在构建时选择配置时（例如 Debug ， Release ），当 ctest 命令未指定 -C 选项时，这将指定要构建的默认配置。该值将替换为 MakeCommand 的值，以替换文字字符串 ${CTEST_CONFIGURATION_TYPE} 如果出现）。

trans-unit.source: When the command will happen is determined by which of the following is specified:
trans-unit.target: 什么时候会发生命令由以下哪项决定。

trans-unit.source: When the cost of a test is not defined by the project, ctest will initially use a default cost of 0. It computes a weighted average of the cost each time a test is run and uses that as an improved estimate of the cost for the next run. The more a test is re-run in the same build directory, the more representative the cost should become.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目未定义测试成本，则 ctest 最初将使用默认成本 0 。每次运行测试时，它都会计算成本的加权平均值，并将其用作下一次运行的成本的改进估算值。在同一个构建目录中重新运行测试的次数越多，成本应该越具有代表性。

trans-unit.source: When the function is invoked, the recorded <commands> are first modified by replacing formal parameters (${arg1}, …) with the arguments passed, and then invoked as normal commands.
trans-unit.target: 调用该函数时，首先通过使用传递的参数替换形式参数（ ${arg1} ，…）来修改记录的 <commands> ，然后将其作为普通命令来调用。

trans-unit.source: When the function is invoked, the recorded <commands> are first modified by replacing formal parameters (${arg1}, ...) with the arguments passed, and then invoked as normal commands.

When the module provides only a single library, this variable can be used to specify where to find headers for using the library (or more accurately, the path that consumers of the library should add to their header search path). It would be appropriate to use this as the result variable in a find_path() command.

When the output of ctest is being sent directly to a terminal, the progress through the set of tests is reported by updating the same line rather than printing start and end messages for each test on new lines. This can significantly reduce the verbosity of the test output. Test completion messages are still output on their own line for failed tests and the final test summary will also still be logged.
trans-unit.target: 当将ctest的输出直接发送到终端时，通过更新同一行而不是在新行上打印每个测试的开始和结束消息来报告测试集的进度。这可以显着降低测试输出的详细程度。对于失败的测试，测试完成消息仍会自行输出，并且最终测试摘要仍将记录下来。

trans-unit.source: When the resource allocation feature is used, CTest will not oversubscribe resources. For example, if a resource has 8 slots, CTest will not run tests that collectively use more than 8 slots at a time. This has the effect of limiting how many tests can run at any given time, even if a high -j argument is used, if those tests all use some slots from the same resource. In addition, it means that a single test that uses more of a resource than is available on a machine will not run at all (and will be reported as Not Run).
trans-unit.target: 使用资源分配功能时，CTest不会超额预定资源。例如，如果一个资源有8个插槽，则CTest将不会运行一次总共使用8个以上插槽的测试。即使这些测试都使用同一资源中的某些插槽，即使使用高 -j 参数，这也会限制在任何给定时间可以运行多少测试。另外，这意味着使用资源比计算机上可用资源更多的单个测试根本不会运行（并且将报告为 Not Run ）。

trans-unit.source: When the second script runs ctest_start(APPEND), it will read the Experimental model and GroupExperimental group from the TAG file generated by the first ctest_start() command. Please note that if you call ctest_start(APPEND) and specify a different model or group than in the first ctest_start() command, a warning will be issued, and the new model and group will be used.
trans-unit.target: 当第二个脚本运行 ctest_start(APPEND) 时，它将从第一个 ctest_start() 命令生成的 TAG 文件中读取 Experimental 模型和 GroupExperimental 组。请注意，如果您调用 ctest_start(APPEND) 并指定与第一个 ctest_start() 命令中不同的模型或组，则会发出警告，并使用新的模型和组。

trans-unit.source: When the second script runs ctest_start(APPEND), it will read the Experimental model and TrackExperimental track from the TAG file generated by the first ctest_start() command. Please note that if you call ctest_start(APPEND) and specify a different model or track than in the first ctest_start() command, a warning will be issued, and the new model and track will be used.
trans-unit.target: 当第二个脚本运行 ctest_start(APPEND) 时，它将从第一个 ctest_start() 命令生成的 TAG 文件中读取 Experimental 模型和 TrackExperimental 轨道。请注意，如果您调用 ctest_start(APPEND) 并指定了与第一个 ctest_start() 命令不同的模型或轨道，则会发出警告，并使用新的模型和轨道。

trans-unit.source: When the server is busy for a long time, it is polite to send back replies of type “progress” to the client. These will contain a “progressMessage” with a string describing the action currently taking place as well as “progressMinimum”, “progressMaximum” and “progressCurrent” with integer values describing the range of progress.
trans-unit.target: 当服务器长时间处于忙碌状态时，有礼貌地将“ progress”类型的回复发送回客户端。它们将包含“ progressMessage”，其中包含描述当前发生的操作的字符串，以及“ progressMinimum”，“ progressMaximum”和“ progressCurrent”，其中包含描述进度范围的整数值。

trans-unit.source: When the special case for libraries in implicit link directories was first introduced the list of implicit link directories was simply hard-coded (e.g. /lib, /usr/lib, and a few others). Since that time, CMake has learned to detect the implicit link directories used by the compiler front-end. If necessary, the find_library() command could be taught to use this information to help find libraries of the proper architecture.
trans-unit.target: 首次引入隐式链接目录中的库的特殊情况时，隐式链接目录的列表被简单地硬编码（例如 /lib ， /usr/lib 以及其他几个）。从那时起，CMake学会了检测编译器前端使用的隐式链接目录。如有必要，可以教 find_library() 命令使用此信息来帮助查找适当体系结构的库。

trans-unit.source: When the standalone toolchain targets ARM v7, optionally set thisto ON to target ARM NEON devices. See variable documentation for details.
trans-unit.target: 当独立工具链针对ARM v7时，可以选择将此选项设置为 ON 以针对ARM NEON设备。有关详细信息，请参见变量文档。

trans-unit.source: When the standalone toolchain targets ARM, optionally set this to ON to target 32-bit ARM instead of 16-bit Thumb. See variable documentation for details.
trans-unit.target: 当独立工具链针对ARM时，可以选择将此选项设置为 ON 以针对32位ARM而不是16位Thumb。有关详细信息，请参见变量文档。

trans-unit.source: When the test outputs a line that matches regex its start time is reset to the current time and its timeout duration is changed to seconds. Prior to this, the timeout duration is determined by the TIMEOUT property or the CTEST_TEST_TIMEOUT variable if either of these are set. Because the test’s start time is reset, its execution time will not include any time that was spent waiting for the matching output.
trans-unit.target: 当测试输出与 regex 匹配的行时，其开始时间将重置为当前时间，并且其超时时间将更改为 seconds 。在此之前，超时时间由 TIMEOUT 属性或 CTEST_TEST_TIMEOUT 变量（如果已设置）决定。因为测试的开始时间已重置，所以它的执行时间将不包括等待匹配输出所花费的任何时间。

trans-unit.source: When the test outputs a line that matches regex its start time is reset to the current time and its timeout duration is changed to seconds. Prior to this, the timeout duration is determined by the TIMEOUT property or the CTEST_TEST_TIMEOUT variable if either of these are set. Because the test's start time is reset, its execution time will not include any time that was spent waiting for the matching output.

When there are multiple .qrc files with the same name, CMake will generate unspecified unique output file names for rcc. Therefore, if Q_INIT_RESOURCE() or Q_CLEANUP_RESOURCE() need to be used, the .qrc file name must be unique.
trans-unit.target: 当多个具有相同名称的 .qrc 文件时，CMake将为 rcc 生成未指定的唯一输出文件名。因此，如果需要使用 Q_INIT_RESOURCE() 或 Q_CLEANUP_RESOURCE() ，则 .qrc 文件名必须唯一。

trans-unit.source: When this behavior is enable for generated Xcode projects, the EFFECTIVE_PLATFORM_NAME variable will leak into Generator expressions like TARGET_FILE and will render those mostly unusable.
trans-unit.target: 为生成的Xcode项目启用此行为后， EFFECTIVE_PLATFORM_NAME 变量将泄漏到 TARGET_FILE 之类的 Generator expressions ，并使大多数表达式不可用。

trans-unit.source: When this option is enabled, no attempt is made to download or update any content. It is assumed that all content has already been populated in a previous run or the source directories have been pointed at existing contents the developer has provided manually (using options described further below). When the developer knows that no changes have been made to any content details, turning this option ON can significantly speed up the configure stage. It is OFF by default.
trans-unit.target: 启用此选项后，不会尝试下载或更新任何内容。假定在上一次运行中已经填充了所有内容，或者已将源目录指向开发人员手动提供的现有内容（使用下面进一步说明的选项）。当开发人员知道未对任何内容详细信息进行任何更改时，将此选项设置为 ON 可大大加快配置过程。默认情况下为 OFF 。

trans-unit.source: When this option is enabled, the git clone operation will be given the --depth 1 option. This performs a shallow clone, which avoids downloading the whole history and instead retrieves just the commit denoted by the GIT_TAG option.
trans-unit.target: 启用此选项后，将为 git clone 操作提供 --depth 1 选项。这将执行浅表克隆，从而避免下载整个历史记录，而是仅检索由 GIT_TAG 选项表示的提交。

trans-unit.source: When this option is enabled, the build will be done directly within the external project’s source tree. This should generally be avoided, the use of a separate build directory is usually preferred, but it can be useful when the external project assumes an in-source build. The BINARY_DIR option should not be specified if building in-source.
trans-unit.target: 启用此选项后，将直接在外部项目的源代码树中完成构建。通常应避免这种情况，通常首选使用单独的构建目录，但是当外部项目采用源内构建时，此目录将很有用。该 BINARY_DIR 选项不应如果建设源指定。

trans-unit.source: When this option is enabled, the build will be done directly within the external project's source tree. This should generally be avoided, the use of a separate build directory is usually preferred, but it can be useful when the external project assumes an in-source build. The BINARY_DIR option should not be specified if building in-source.
When this option is enabled, the test step will be executed before the install step. The default behavior is for the test step to run after the install step.
trans-unit.target: 启用该选项后,测试步骤将在安装步骤之前执行。默认的行为是测试步骤在安装步骤之后运行。

trans-unit.source: When this option is present, it is generally advisable to make the value a cache variable under the developer’s control rather than hard-coding it. If this option is not present, the default value is taken from the EP_UPDATE_DISCONNECTED directory property. If that is also not defined, updates are performed as normal. The EP_UPDATE_DISCONNECTED directory property is intended as a convenience for controlling the UPDATE_DISCONNECTED behavior for an entire section of a project’s directory hierarchy and may be a more convenient method of giving developers control over whether or not to perform updates (assuming the project also provides a cache variable or some other convenient method for setting the directory property).
trans-unit.target: 如果存在此选项，通常建议在开发人员的控制下将该值设置为缓存变量，而不是对其进行硬编码。如果不存在此选项，则默认值来自 EP_UPDATE_DISCONNECTED 目录属性。如果还没有定义，则按常规执行更新。该 EP_UPDATE_DISCONNECTED 目录属性旨在为控制便利 UPDATE_DISCONNECTED 一个项目的目录层次结构的一整节的行为，并且可以给人一种更方便的方法开发者的控制权是否要进行更新（假设该项目还提供了一个缓存变量或其他用于设置目录属性的便捷方法）。

trans-unit.source: When this option is present, it is generally advisable to make the value a cache variable under the developer's control rather than hard-coding it. If this option is not present, the default value is taken from the EP_UPDATE_DISCONNECTED directory property. If that is also not defined, updates are performed as normal. The EP_UPDATE_DISCONNECTED directory property is intended as a convenience for controlling the UPDATE_DISCONNECTED behavior for an entire section of a project's directory hierarchy and may be a more convenient method of giving developers control over whether or not to perform updates (assuming the project also provides a cache variable or some other convenient method for setting the directory property).

When this project is built it will first build the MakeTable executable. It will then run MakeTable to produce Table.h. Finally, it will compile mysqrt.cxx which includes Table.h to produce the MathFunctions library.
trans-unit.target: 构建此项目时，它将首先构建 MakeTable 可执行文件。然后它将运行 MakeTable 生成 Table.h 。最后，它会编译 mysqrt.cxx 包括 Table.h 产生MathFunctions库。

trans-unit.source: When this property is ON or if CMAKE_GHS_NO_SOURCE_GROUP_FILE is ON then only a single project file is generated for the target.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 ON ,或者 CMAKE_GHS_NO_SOURCE_GROUP_FILE 为 ON ,则仅为目标生成一个项目文件。

trans-unit.source: When this property is ON, CMake will generate the -p path prefix option for moc on AUTOMOC enabled Qt targets.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性为 ON 时，CMake将在启用 AUTOMOC 的Qt目标上为 moc 生成 -p 路径前缀选项。

trans-unit.source: When this property is ON, CMake will handle .qrc files added as target sources at build time and invoke rcc accordingly. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_AUTORCC variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性为 ON 时，CMake将在构建时处理作为目标源添加的 .qrc 文件，并相应地调用 rcc 。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则通过 CMAKE_AUTORCC 变量的值来初始化此属性。

trans-unit.source: When this property is ON, CMake will scan the header and source files at build time and invoke uic accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性为 ON 时，CMake将在构建时扫描头文件和源文件，并相应地调用 uic 。

trans-unit.source: When this property is enabled, zero or more .def files may also be specified as source files of the target. The exports named by these files will be merged with those detected from the object files to generate a single module definition file to be passed to the linker. This can be used to export symbols from a .dll that are not in any of its object files but are added by the linker from dependencies (e.g. msvcrt.lib).
trans-unit.target: 启用此属性后，也可以将零个或多个 .def 文件指定为目标的源文件。这些文件命名的导出将与从目标文件中检测到的导出合并，以生成单个模块定义文件以传递给链接器。这可用于从 .dll 导出符号，该符号不在其任何目标文件中，但由链接程序从依赖项（例如 msvcrt.lib ）中添加。

trans-unit.source: When this property is populated and when UNITY_BUILD is true, the property value is used to define a compiler definition of the specified name. The value of the defined symbol is unspecified, but it is unique per file path.
When this property is set ON, CMake will scan the header and source files at build time and invoke moc accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为 ON 时，CMake将在构建时扫描头文件和源文件，并相应地调用 moc 。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to TRUE the executable when built on macOS or iOS will be created as an application bundle. This makes it a GUI executable that can be launched from the Finder. See the MACOSX_BUNDLE_INFO_PLIST target property for information about creation of the Info.plist file for the application bundle. This property is initialized by the value of the variable CMAKE_MACOSX_BUNDLE if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为 TRUE ,则在macOS或iOS上构建的可执行文件将作为应用程序捆绑创建。这使它成为可以从Finder启动的GUI可执行文件。请参阅 MACOSX_BUNDLE_INFO_PLIST 目标属性，以获取有关为应用程序捆绑包创建 Info.plist 文件的信息。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则通过变量 CMAKE_MACOSX_BUNDLE 的值来初始化此属性。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to TRUE, the directory portion of the install_name field of this shared library will be @rpath unless overridden by INSTALL_NAME_DIR. This indicates the shared library is to be found at runtime using runtime paths (rpaths).
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为 TRUE 时，此共享库的 install_name 字段的目录部分将为 @rpath ,除非被 INSTALL_NAME_DIR 覆盖。这表示将在运行时使用运行时路径（rpaths）找到共享库。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to set to false (which is the default) then it will either be built with the device SDK or the simulator SDK depending on the SDK set. But if this property is set to true then the target will at install time also be built for the corresponding SDK and combined into one library.
trans-unit.target: 当这个属性被设置为false(这是默认的),那么根据SDK的设置,它将与设备SDK或模拟器SDK一起构建。但如果该属性设置为true,那么在安装时,目标也将为相应的SDK构建,并组合成一个库。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to true that enables the ProGuard tool to shrink, optimize, and obfuscate the code by removing unused code and renaming classes, fields, and methods with semantically obscure names. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_ANDROID_PROGUARD variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为true，则ProGuard工具可以通过删除未使用的代码并使用语义上晦涩的名称重命名类，字段和方法来缩小，优化和混淆代码。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则该属性由 CMAKE_ANDROID_PROGUARD 变量的值初始化。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to true the executable when built for Android will be created as an application package. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_ANDROID_GUI variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为true时，将为Android构建可执行文件作为应用程序包。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则通过 CMAKE_ANDROID_GUI 变量的值来初始化此属性。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to true the executable when linked on Windows will be created with a WinMain() entry point instead of just main(). This makes it a GUI executable instead of a console application. See the CMAKE_MFC_FLAG variable documentation to configure use of the Microsoft Foundation Classes (MFC) for WinMain executables. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_WIN32_EXECUTABLE variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为true，则在Windows上链接时的可执行文件将使用WinMain（）入口点而不是仅main（）创建。这使其成为GUI可执行文件，而不是控制台应用程序。请参阅 CMAKE_MFC_FLAG 变量文档，以配置对WinMain可执行文件使用Microsoft基础类（MFC）。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则通过 CMAKE_WIN32_EXECUTABLE 变量的值来初始化此属性。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to true, some dependencies for a static or object library may be removed at generation time if they are not necessary to build the library, since static and object libraries don’t actually link against anything.
trans-unit.target: 当将此属性设置为true时，如果不需要构建静态库或对象库的某些依赖关系，则在生成时可能会删除它们，因为静态库和对象库实际上并不链接任何对象。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to true, some dependencies for a static or object library may be removed at generation time if they are not necessary to build the library, since static and object libraries don't actually link against anything.
When this property is set to true, the precompile header compiler options will contain a compiler flag which should warn about invalid precompiled headers e.g. -Winvalid-pch for GNU compiler.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为true时，预编译头编译器选项将包含一个编译器标志，该标志应警告无效的预编译头，例如 -Winvalid-pch 编译器的-Winvalid-pch。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to true, the precompiled header compiler options will contain a flag to instantiate templates during the generation of the PCH if supported. This can significantly improve compile times. Supported in Clang since version 11.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为 "true "时,预编译头编译器选项将包含一个标志,在生成PCH的过程中实例化模板(如果支持)。这可以显著改善编译时间。自版本11起支持Clang。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to true, the target source files will be combined into batches for faster compilation. This is done by creating a (set of) unity sources which #include the original sources, then compiling these unity sources instead of the originals. This is known as a Unity or Jumbo build.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为true时，目标源文件将被组合为批处理，以加快编译速度。这是通过创建一个（组）的统一资源做 #include 原始资料，然后编译这些统一来源，而不是原件。这称为Unity或Jumbo构建。

trans-unit.source: When this sub-option of PROGRAM option is specified, command-line arguments will be split as well and stored in <variable>.
trans-unit.target: 当指定 PROGRAM 选项的此子选项时，命令行参数也将被拆分并存储在 <variable> 中。

trans-unit.source: When this variable is set to a non-empty string, CTest will report the value you specified rather than using the update command to discover the current version that is checked out. Use of this variable supersedes UpdateVersionOnly. Like UpdateVersionOnly, using this variable tells CTest not to update the source tree to a different version.
trans-unit.target: 当此变量设置为非空字符串时，CTest将报告您指定的值，而不是使用update命令发现已签出的当前版本。使用此变量代替 UpdateVersionOnly 。像 UpdateVersionOnly 一样，使用此变量告诉CTest不要将源树更新为其他版本。

trans-unit.source: When unset or empty the directory <dir>/<target-name>_autogen is used where <dir> is CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR and <target-name> is NAME.
trans-unit.target: 取消设置或清空时，将使用目录 <dir>/<target-name>_autogen ，其中 <dir> 是 CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR ,而 <target-name> 是 NAME 。

trans-unit.source: When using IMPORTED targets, the qtmain.lib static library is automatically linked on Windows for WIN32 executables. To disable that globally, set the QT4_NO_LINK_QTMAIN variable before finding Qt4. To disable that for a particular executable, set the QT4_NO_LINK_QTMAIN target property to TRUE on the executable.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 IMPORTED 指标，qtmain.lib静态库会自动在Windows上链接的 WIN32 可执行文件。要全局禁用该功能，请在找到Qt4之前设置 QT4_NO_LINK_QTMAIN 变量。要为特定的可执行文件禁用该功能，请将可执行文件上的 QT4_NO_LINK_QTMAIN 目标属性设置为 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: When using MPIEXEC_EXECUTABLE to execute MPI applications, you should typically use all of the MPIEXEC_EXECUTABLE flags as follows:
trans-unit.target: 使用 MPIEXEC_EXECUTABLE 执行MPI应用程序时，通常应使用所有 MPIEXEC_EXECUTABLE 标志，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: When using MSVC-like compilers in CMake 3.14 and below, warning flags like /W3 are added to CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS by default. This is problematic for projects that want to choose a different warning level programmatically. In particular, it requires string editing of the CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS variables with knowledge of the CMake builtin defaults so they can be replaced.
trans-unit.target: 在CMake 3.14和更低版本中使用类似MSVC的编译器时，默认情况下，将 /W3 之类的警告标志添加到 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS 。对于希望以编程方式选择其他警告级别的项目而言，这是个问题。特别是，它需要使用CMake内置默认值的知识来对 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS 变量进行字符串编辑，以便可以替换它们。

trans-unit.source: When using MSVC-like compilers in CMake 3.19 and below, the RTTI flag /GR is added to CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS by default. This behavior is left from support for MSVC versions from Visual Studio 2003 and below that did not enable RTTI by default. It is no longer necessary. Furthermore, it is problematic for projects that want to change to /GR- programmatically. In particular, it requires string editing of the CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS variable with knowledge of the CMake builtin default so it can be replaced.
When using Xcode, there can be more than one Xcode version installed. Which one to use can be selected in a number of different ways, but the most common methods are:
trans-unit.target: 在使用Xcode时,可以安装多个Xcode版本。使用哪一个可以用不同的方法来选择,但最常见的方法是。

trans-unit.source: When using a Visual Studio generator with the CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME variable set to Android, this variable contains the version number of the installed NVIDIA Nsight Tegra Visual Studio Edition.
trans-unit.target: 在将 CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME 变量设置为 Android 的情况下使用Visual Studio生成器时，此变量包含已安装的NVIDIA Nsight Tegra Visual Studio Edition的版本号。

trans-unit.source: When using one of the Visual Studio Generators with the Intel Fortran plugin installed in Visual Studio, a subdirectory named after the configuration will be appended to the path where modules are created. For example, if Fortran_MODULE_DIRECTORY is set to C:/some/path, modules will end up in C:/some/path/Debug (or C:/some/path/Release etc.) when an Intel Fortran .vfproj file is generated, and in C:/some/path when any other generator is used.
trans-unit.target: 在Visual Studio生成器之一与Visual Studio中安装的Intel Fortran插件一起使用时，以配置命名的子目录将被附加到创建模块的路径中。例如，如果将 Fortran_MODULE_DIRECTORY 设置为 C:/some/path ，则在生成Intel Fortran .vfproj 文件时，模块将以 C:/some/path/Debug （或 C:/some/path/Release 等）结尾。，以及使用其他任何生成器时的 C:/some/path 中。

trans-unit.source: When using one of the Command-Line Build Tool Generators CMake expects that the environment needed by the compiler toolchain is already configured in the shell. When using one of the IDE Build Tool Generators, no particular environment is needed.
trans-unit.target: 使用命令行构建工具生成器之一时， CMake期望在外壳中已经配置了编译器工具链所需的环境。使用IDE生成工具生成器之一时，不需要特定的环境。

trans-unit.source: When using saved content details, a call to FetchContent_Populate() records information in global properties which can be queried at any time. This information includes the source and binary directories associated with the content and also whether or not the content population has been processed during the current configure run.
trans-unit.target: 使用保存的内容详细信息时，对 FetchContent_Populate() 的调用会将信息记录在可以随时查询的全局属性中。此信息包括与内容关联的源和二进制目录，以及在当前配置运行期间是否已处理内容填充。

trans-unit.source: When using the cmake(1) command line tool, a preset can be invoked by using the --preset option. If --preset is specified, the generator and build directory are not required, but can be specified to override them. For example, if you have the following CMakePresets.json file:
trans-unit.target: 使用 cmake(1) 命令行工具时，可以使用 --preset 选项调用预设。如果指定了 --preset ，则不需要generator和build目录，但是可以指定它们以覆盖它们。例如，如果您具有以下 CMakePresets.json 文件：

trans-unit.source: When using the Visual Studio generators, CMake generates a PRE_BUILDcustom command instead of the <ORIGIN>_autogencustom target (for AUTOMOC and AUTOUIC). This isn’t always possible though and an <ORIGIN>_autogencustom target is used, when either
trans-unit.target: 使用 Visual Studio generators ，CMake生成 PRE_BUILD custom command 而不是 <ORIGIN>_autogen custom target （对于 AUTOMOC 和 AUTOUIC ）。但是，这并非总是可能的，并且使用 <ORIGIN>_autogen custom target 时，

trans-unit.source: When using the Visual Studio generators, CMake generates a PRE_BUILDcustom command instead of the <ORIGIN>_autogencustom target (for AUTOMOC and AUTOUIC). This isn't always possible though and an <ORIGIN>_autogencustom target is used, when either
When using the Ninja generator, all source files are first preprocessed in order to generate module dependency information. Setting this property to OFF will make Ninja skip this step.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Ninja 生成器时，首先对所有源文件进行预处理，以生成模块依赖项信息。将此属性设置为 OFF 将使 Ninja 跳过此步骤。

trans-unit.source: When using the Xcode generator, libraries to be linked will be specified in the Xcode project file using either the “Link Binary With Libraries” build phase or directly as linker flags. The former allows Xcode to manage build paths, which may be necessary when creating Xcode archives because it may use different build paths to a regular build.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 Xcode 生成器时，将使用“使用库链接二进制”构建阶段或直接将其作为链接器标志在Xcode项目文件中指定要链接的库。前者允许Xcode管理构建路径，这在创建Xcode存档时可能是必需的，因为它可能使用不同的构建路径来进行常规构建。

trans-unit.source: When using the Ninja generator, all source files are first preprocessed in order to generate module dependency information. Setting this property to OFF will make Ninja skip this step.

When using the Xcode generator, libraries to be linked will be specified in the Xcode project file using either the "Link Binary With Libraries" build phase or directly as linker flags. The former allows Xcode to manage build paths, which may be necessary when creating Xcode archives because it may use different build paths to a regular build.

When using the Eclipse project generator, CMake tries to find the Eclipse executable and detect the version of it. Depending on the version it finds, some features are enabled or disabled. If CMake doesn’t find Eclipse, it assumes the oldest supported version, Eclipse Callisto (3.2).
trans-unit.target: 使用Eclipse项目生成器时，CMake会尝试查找Eclipse可执行文件并检测其版本。根据发现的版本，某些功能是启用还是禁用的。如果CMake找不到Eclipse，则使用受支持的最旧版本Eclipse Callisto（3.2）。

trans-unit.source: When using the Eclipse project generator, CMake tries to find the Eclipse executable and detect the version of it. Depending on the version it finds, some features are enabled or disabled. If CMake doesn't find Eclipse, it assumes the oldest supported version, Eclipse Callisto (3.2).

When using the Eclipse, CodeBlocks, CodeLite, Kate or Sublime generators, CMake generates Makefiles (CMAKE_GENERATOR) and additionally project files for the respective IDE. This IDE project file generator is stored in CMAKE_EXTRA_GENERATOR (e.g. Eclipse CDT4).
trans-unit.target: 当使用Eclipse，CodeBlocks，CodeLite，Kate或Sublime生成器时，CMake会生成Makefile（ CMAKE_GENERATOR ）以及相应IDE的项目文件。该IDE项目文件生成器存储在 CMAKE_EXTRA_GENERATOR 中（例如 Eclipse CDT4 ）。

trans-unit.source: When using this to specify names with and without a version suffix, we recommend specifying the unversioned name first so that locally-built packages can be found before those provided by distributions.
trans-unit.target: 当使用这个来指定有版本后缀和没有版本后缀的名称时,我们建议先指定没有版本的名称,这样就可以在发行版提供的软件包之前找到本地构建的软件包。

trans-unit.source: Whenever CMake is re-run, by default the external project’s sources will be updated if the download method supports updates (e.g. a git repository would be checked if the GIT_TAG does not refer to a specific commit).
trans-unit.target: 每当重新运行CMake时，默认情况下，如果下载方法支持更新，则将更新外部项目的源（例如，如果 GIT_TAG 未引用特定的提交，则将检查git存储库）。

trans-unit.source: Whenever CMake is re-run, by default the external project's sources will be updated if the download method supports updates (e.g. a git repository would be checked if the GIT_TAG does not refer to a specific commit).

Whenever one of the following target based generator expressions are used as a command to execute or is mentioned in a command argument, a target-level dependency will be added automatically so that the mentioned target will be built before any target using this custom command (see policy CMP0112).
trans-unit.target: 每当以下基于目标的生成器表达式之一用作执行命令或在命令参数中提及时，都会自动添加目标级别的依赖项，以便使用此自定义命令在所有目标之前构建提及的目标（请参见策略 CMP0112 ）。

trans-unit.source: Whenever one of the following target based generator expressions are used as a command to execute or is mentioned in a command argument, a target-level dependency will be added automatically so that the mentioned target will be built before this custom target (see policy CMP0112).
trans-unit.target: 每当以下基于目标的生成器表达式之一用作命令执行或在命令参数中提及时，都会自动添加目标级别的依赖项，以便在此自定义目标之前构建提及的目标（请参阅策略 CMP0112 ） 。

trans-unit.source: Where <SOURCE_DIR_CHECKSUM> is a checksum computed from the relative parent directory path of the moc input file. This scheme allows to have moc input files with the same name in different directories.
trans-unit.target: 其中 <SOURCE_DIR_CHECKSUM> 是从 moc 输入文件的相对父目录路径计算出的校验和。此方案允许在不同目录中具有相同名称的 moc 输入文件。

trans-unit.source: Where <option> is available to the user if <depends> is true. When <option> is available, the given <help_text> and initial <value> are used. If the <depends> condition is not true, <option> will not be presented and will always have the value given by <force>. Any value set by the user is preserved for when the option is presented again. Each element in the fourth parameter is evaluated as an if-condition, so Condition Syntax can be used.
trans-unit.target: 其中 <option> 是提供给用户，如果 <depends> 是真实的。当 <option> 可用时，将使用给定的 <help_text> 和初始 <value> 。如果 <depends> 条件不成立，则不会显示 <option> 并将始终具有 <force> 给定的值。当再次显示该选项时，将保留用户设置的任何值。第四个参数中的每个元素都将作为if条件进行评估，因此可以使用条件语法。

trans-unit.source: Where X.Y would be a specific version of the CUDA Toolkit, such as /usr/local/cuda-9.0 or C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v9.0
trans-unit.target: 其中 X.Y 将是CUDA工具包的特定版本，如 /usr/local/cuda-9.0 或 C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v9.0

trans-unit.source: Which results in the following output:

While IMPORTED targets on their own are useful, they still require that the project that imports them knows the locations of the target files on disk. The real power of IMPORTED targets is when the project providing the target files also provides a CMake file to help import them. A project can be setup to produce the necessary information so that it can easily be used by other CMake projects be it from a build directory, a local install or when packaged.
trans-unit.target: 尽管“ IMPORTED 目标”本身很有用，但它们仍要求导入目标的项目知道磁盘上目标文件的位置。真正的力量 IMPORTED 目标是在提供目标文件的项目还提供了CMake的文件来帮助导入。可以设置一个项目以生成必要的信息，以便其他CMake项目可以轻松地使用它，无论是来自构建目录，本地安装还是打包时。

trans-unit.source: While projA defines content details for projE, it does not need to explicitly call FetchContent_MakeAvailable(projE) or FetchContent_Populate(projD) itself. Instead, it leaves that to the child projB. For higher level projects, it is often enough to just define the override content details and leave the actual population to the child projects. This saves repeating the same thing at each level of the project hierarchy unnecessarily.
trans-unit.target: 虽然 projA 定义了 projE 的内容详细信息，但是它不需要显式调用 FetchContent_MakeAvailable(projE) 或 FetchContent_Populate(projD) 本身。而是将其留给子 projB 。对于更高级别的项目，仅定义替代内容详细信息并将实际填充量留给子项目通常就足够了。这样可以节省不必要地在项目层次结构的每个级别重复相同的内容。

trans-unit.source: While IDE vendors may be tempted to bundle different versions of CMake with their application, such practice is not recommended. CMake has strong guarantees of backwards compatibility, and there is no reason not to use a newer version of CMake than what a project requires, or indeed, the very latest version. Therefore, it is recommended that IDE vendors that bundle CMake with their application always include the very latest patch version of CMake available at the time of release.
trans-unit.target: 虽然集成开发环境供应商可能会想在他们的应用程序中捆绑不同版本的CMake,但这种做法是不推荐的。CMake有很强的向后兼容性保证,没有理由不使用比项目所需的版本更新的CMake,甚至是最新的版本。因此,建议IDE厂商在其应用中捆绑CMake时,总是包含CMake发布时的最新补丁版本。

trans-unit.source: While a path can be created with care using an ordinary set() command, it is recommended to use cmake_path(SET) instead, as it automatically converts the path to the required form where required. The cmake_path(APPEND) subcommand may be another suitable alternative where a path needs to be constructed by joining fragments. The following example compares the three methods for constructing the same path:

While building a project for submission to CDash, CTest scans the build output for errors and warnings and reports them with surrounding context from the build log. This generic approach works for all build tools, but does not give details about the command invocation that produced a given problem. One may get more detailed reports by setting the CTEST_USE_LAUNCHERS variable:
trans-unit.target: 在构建要提交到CDash的项目时，CTest会扫描构建输出中的错误和警告，并从构建日志中向周围环境报告它们。这种通用方法适用于所有构建工具，但未提供产生特定问题的命令调用的详细信息。可以通过设置 CTEST_USE_LAUNCHERS 变量来获取更详细的报告：

trans-unit.source: While features are typically specified in programming language standards, CMake provides a primary user interface based on granular handling of the features, not the language standard that introduced the feature.
trans-unit.target: 虽然功能通常是在编程语言标准中指定的,但CMake提供的主要用户界面是基于对功能的细化处理,而不是引入该功能的语言标准。

trans-unit.source: While processing a CMake file loaded by include() or find_package() this variable contains the full path to the file including it. The top of the include stack is always the CMakeLists.txt for the current directory. See also CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_FILE.
trans-unit.target: 在处理由 include() 或 find_package() 加载的CMake文件时，此变量包含包含该文件的文件的完整路径。包含堆栈的顶部始终是当前目录的 CMakeLists.txt 。另请参阅 CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_FILE 。

trans-unit.source: While reading, parsing, and evaluating the contents of CMakePresets.json is straightforward, it is not trivial. In addition to the documentation, IDE vendors may also wish to refer to the CMake source code and test cases for a better understanding of how to implement the format. This file provides a machine-readable JSON schema for the CMakePresets.json format that IDE vendors may find useful for validation and providing editing assistance.
trans-unit.target: 虽然读取，解析和评估 CMakePresets.json 的内容很简单，但并不简单。除文档外，IDE供应商还可能希望参考CMake源代码和测试用例，以更好地了解如何实现该格式。 This file 为 CMakePresets.json 格式提供了机器可读的JSON模式，IDE供应商可能会发现该模式可用于验证和提供编辑帮助。

For any configuration run (including the first), the environment variable will be ignored if the equivalent CMAKE_<TYPE>_LINKER_FLAGS_INIT variable is defined.
trans-unit.target: CMake将仅在第一种配置上使用它来确定默认链接器标志，此后， LDFLAGS 的值将以 CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS_INIT ， CMAKE_SHARED_LINKER_FLAGS_INIT 和 CMAKE_MODULE_LINKER_FLAGS_INIT 的形式存储在缓存中。对于任何配置运行（包括第一个配置），如果定义了等效的 CMAKE_<TYPE>_LINKER_FLAGS_INIT 变量，则将忽略环境变量。

trans-unit.source: With EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL set to false or not set at all, the target will be brought up to date as part of doing a make install or its equivalent for the CMake generator being used. If a target has EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL set to true, then any attempt to install that target has undefined behavior. Note that such a target can still safely be listed in an install(TARGETS) command as long as the install components the target belongs to are not part of the set of components that anything tries to install.
trans-unit.target: 将 EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL 设置为false或完全不设置时，将对目标进行更新，这是进行 make install 或对所使用的CMake生成器进行等效安装的一部分。如果目标已将 EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL 设置为true，则任何尝试安装该目标的行为均未定义。请注意，只要目标所属的安装组件不属于任何尝试安装的组件集，就可以安全地在 install(TARGETS) 命令中列出该目标。

depending on whether VAR is set in CMake to any value not considered a false constant by the if() command. The “…” content on the line after the variable name, if any, is processed as above. Input file lines of the form #cmakedefine01 VAR will be replaced with either #define VAR 1 or #define VAR 0 similarly. The result lines (with the exception of the #undef comments) can be indented using spaces and/or tabs between the # character and the cmakedefine or cmakedefine01 words. This whitespace indentation will be preserved in the output lines:
trans-unit.target: 取决于 if() 命令是否将CMake中的 VAR 设置为任何不视为错误常量的值。变量名称之后的行中的“…”内容（如果有）按上述方式处理。同样，格式为 #cmakedefine01 VAR 的输入文件行将替换为 #define VAR 1 或 #define VAR 0 。可以使用 # 字符与 cmakedefine 或 cmakedefine01 字之间的空格和/或制表符缩进结果行（ #undef 注释除外）。此空格缩进将保留在输出行中：

in case your MEX file is using the GPU and in order to be able to run unit tests on this MEX file, the GPU resources should be properly released by Matlab. A possible solution is to make Matlab aware of the use of the GPU resources in the session, which can be performed by a command such as D = gpuDevice() at the beginning of the test script (or via a fixture).
trans-unit.target: 如果您的MEX文件正在使用GPU，并且为了能够在此MEX文件上运行单元测试，则Matlab应该正确释放GPU资源。一种可能的解决方案是使Matlab意识到会话中GPU资源的使用，这可以通过在测试脚本的开头（或通过固定装置）通过诸如 D = gpuDevice() 类的命令来执行。

links main to A B A B. While one repetition is usually sufficient, pathological object file and symbol arrangements can require more. One may handle such cases by using the LINK_INTERFACE_MULTIPLICITY target property or by manually repeating the component in the last target_link_libraries call. However, if two archives are really so interdependent they should probably be combined into a single archive, perhaps by using Object Libraries.
trans-unit.target: 将 main 链接到 A B A B 。通常一次重复就足够了，但病理目标文件和符号排列可能需要更多。可以通过使用 LINK_INTERFACE_MULTIPLICITY 目标属性或在上次 target_link_libraries 调用中手动重复该组件来处理此类情况。但是，如果两个存档确实如此相互依赖，则可能应该使用Object Libraries将它们合并为一个存档。

nvcc can return negative numbers as return values which confuses Visual Studio into thinking that the command succeeded. The script now checks the error codes and produces errors when there was a problem.

nvcc has been known to not delete incomplete results when it encounters problems. This confuses build systems into thinking the target was generated when in fact an unusable file exists. The script now deletes the output files if there was an error.
